text: The truth.’ Dumbledore sighed. ‘It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution
author: J.K. Rowling

text: You see our choices reveal who we really are, much more than our abilities
author: J.K. Rowling

text: If you want to get to know a man, find out how he treats his subordinates, and not equals
author: J.K. Rowling

text: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
author: Null

text: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

text: I never think of the future. It comes soon enough.
author: Albert Einstein

text: I believe that every person is born with talent.
author: Maya Angelou

text: We must become the change we want to see.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost
